row.name: PCK.AUTOMIC_AZURE.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCE
row.description: Attach the binary for Docker package

row.process:
:ATTACH_RES "PCK.AUTOMIC_AZURE.PRV.STORE" ,"AZURETOOL", C, N
! Setting jar class path into variable :SET &UC4RB_AZR_PATH_JAR#= STR_CAT(&$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#,"azure-tool.jar")
